uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

base_ethernet_address.description: MAC address of the base Ethernet interface.

uplink_port.description: The uplink port(port_id) of switch connected to Cloud Manager/Central. It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.

current_ip_address.description: Current IP address is a vlan ip address connected to Cloud Manager/Central. It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.
